abstract: Ford Motor and its China venture partners, Mazda Motor and Chongqing Changan Automobile, are seeking Chinese government approval to end their three-way tie up, Reuters reported.
snippet: Ford Motor and its China venture partners, Mazda Motor and Chongqing Changan Automobile, are seeking Chinese government approval to end their three-way tie up, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Ford Motor and its China venture partners, Mazda Motor and Chongqing Changan Automobile, are seeking Chinese government approval to end their three-way tie up, Reuters reported, citing two sources.

headline.main: Ford, Mazda and China Firm to End ‘Garage à Trois’?
